name: yolactpp_2020-02-11-predict
description: Making predictions using object detection models built with YOLACT++ 2020-02-11

clear_dataset.help: If enabled, any meta-data or predictions get removed from the dataset beforehand.

min_score.help: The minimum score (0-1) that the predictions need to achieve for being included.

mask_threshold.help: The threshold (0-1) to use for determining the contour of a mask.

bbox_as_fallback.help: When outputting polygons the bbox can be used as fallback polygon. This happens if the ratio between the surrounding bbox of the polygon and the bbox is smaller than the specified value. Turned off if < 0.

top_x.help: The top X predictions to output.

store_predictions.help: If enabled, the predictions get stored back in the dataset that they were generated for.

generate_polygons.help: If enabled, polygons are traced around the detected objects.

generate_mask_images.help: If enabled, PNGs with an indexed palette are generated depicting the detected objects.

confidence_scores.help: The semicolon-separated list of classes for calculating confidence scores, which get stored back in the meta-data of the image.
